wikipedia_page.main: Rev. Augustus Robert Buckland (18 April 1857 – 8 April 1942) was a British divine and writer.

response: According to Buckland, Jackson was a thorough, methodical, patient worker, reserved in manner, but nevertheless sympathetic .Much of this material about John Jackson is derived from Augustus Robert Buckland's article in the DNB: Jackson, John (1811-1885) (DNB00)
